treatment-md.title: Syncheilaxonchium Coomans & Nair 1971
treatment-md.article-title: Description of two new and five known species of the genus Axonchium Cobb, 1920 (Nematoda: Dorylamida) from India with diagnostic compendia and keys to species of the genera Axonchium and Syncheilaxonchium Coomans & Nair, 1975
